line_1: I'm vex'd to see you, Dad.
line_2: While back to wall you lean so sad,
Yet ne'ertheless I am right glad,

line_1: I love my own old Dad.
line_2: But yet although his strength be fled,
And every body looks so sad,
Which slyly to the hen-roost led, —

line_1: You do not hear me, Dad.
line_2: Down on your bosom sinks your head: —

line_1: The Todpole Imp might call thee Dad;
line_2: That if she whelp'd a squauling Lad,
